imdb.plot outline: In this chapter two different notions, on how each empire saw the world converge and yet differ in one equally important aspect for both cultures: religion. The spiritual conquest was an even more complicated task than the military conquest, where the role of the friars and humanists was pivotal in this transformative process. The permanence and merge of beliefs became the religious basis for the modern Mexicans.
imdb.title: La Conquista, capítulo III. Los sacrificios humanos y la conquista espiritual
akas: La Conquista, capítulo III. Los sacrificios humanos y la conquista espiritual (Mexico)
plot: In this chapter two different notions, on how each empire saw the world converge and yet differ in one equally important aspect for both cultures: religion. The spiritual conquest was an even more complicated task than the military conquest, where the role of the friars and humanists was pivotal in this transformative process. The permanence and merge of beliefs became the religious basis for the modern Mexicans.::Clío TV
